entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thundershower late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Tantramar Marsh area late this afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 22 April 2021

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain and flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Tantramar Marsh area. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 22 April 2021

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Tantramar Marsh area early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 22 April 2021
